channel.title: Latching values one pot - 3 functions
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm using axocontrol, so I want to assign a pot for 3 parameters and use the switches to change the function.
So I want the values analog in values to stay the same as I change parameter
I've done the above using logic, demuxes and latching. The latching only works in an off condition though. When I cycle back through the value will jump to whatever the current state of the analog in is.
Any ideas to get values to fully latch until the pot is moved?
